text: Edward M. Greitzer is an American physicist currently the H. N. Slater Professor of Aeronautics and Astronautics at Massachusetts Institute of Technology. He is a Fellow of the American Institute of Aeronautics and Astronautics, Royal Academy of Engineering and ASME. His vast research includes turbomachinery, fluid mechanics, thermodynamics, energy, internal flow, fluid systems and gas turbines and engine design. ==Education== *A.B. (Physics), 1962 Harvard College *S.M. (Engineering), 1964 Harvard University *Ph.D. 1970 (Mechanical Engineering), Harvard University ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Massachusetts Institute of Technology faculty Category:21st-century American physicists Category:Harvard University alumni
title: Edward Greitzer
